writer.name: 德拉侯米拉·维哈诺瓦 Drahomíra Vihanová

director.name: 德拉侯米拉·维哈诺瓦 Drahomíra Vihanová

introduction: This is first student film made by Drahomira Vihanova one of most important but sadly also one of most overlooked directors of Czech new wave who latter shot famous movie Squandered Sunday (Zabita nedele). Its also first Vihanova on the tracker.FUGUE ON THE BLACK KEYS tells the story of an African student who studies the piano in Prague in the 1960'. The movie is shot in the style cinéma-vérité and follows young Ferrari in the school, with friends and on the streets where he had to deal with different characters.
